product_name: Omega Pacific ISO Oval Carabiner - Anodized
long_description: The classic oval shape of this 'biner makes it extremely versatile for all climbing disciplines, whether you're hauling gear or clipping bolts. Omega has set the standard with the ISO Cold Forged process creating an extraordinary strength-to-weight ratio. Features a hooded gate for a smoother rope-bearing surface, tapered nose for increased strength and spin rivets for a smooth, snag-free gate surface. Anodized coating won't flake off like paint, helps protect against corrosion and allows you to sort and identify gear easily.
short_description: The classic oval shape of this 'biner makes it extremely versatile for all climbing disciplines, whether you're hauling gear or clipping bolts.
